border_dependency_update: Chunky needs to be updated in order to use ChunkyBorder!
border_save_failed: Não foi possível salvar as barreiras.
command_no_permission: &cYou do not have permission for this command.
error_version: This plugin is not compatible with Minecraft versions below 1.13.
error_version_spigot: This plugin is not compatible with Spigot 1.13!
format_border_add: Added %s world border to %s with center %s, %s, and radius %s.
format_border_bypass_no_target: Não foi possível encontrar um jogador com o nome %s.
format_border_load: Selection loaded from world border for %s.
format_border_no_border: Nenhuma barreira do mundo encontrada no %s.
format_border_wrap: World border wrapping is now %s for %s.
format_cancel_confirm: Cancelled tasks cannot be continued. If you are sure you want to cancel, type '%s'.
format_trim_confirm: &cWarning: Chunks in %s outside of the %s region centered at %s, %s with radius %s will be permanently deleted. Please make sure you have taken a backup of your server before continuing to avoid potential damage. You will be required to restart your server fully after the task has finished. If you understand and wish to proceed, type '%s'.
format_radii: Radius changed for x to %s, and for z to %s.
format_reload_tasks_running: The configuration cannot be reloaded while tasks are running.
format_start: Task started in %s for the %s region centered at %s, %s with radius %s.
format_start_confirm: A task was already started for this world. To continue running it, type '%s'. To start a new task, type '%s'.
format_start_disk: The server only has %s disk space remaining, but the estimated disk space required for the task is %s. If you wish to start anyway, type '%s'.
format_start_limit: Your host has limited the maximum pre-generation radius to %s to avoid excessive disk space usage. Reduce the radius or contact your host if you wish to have this limit removed.
help_cancel: &2chunky cancel&r - Stop and delete current or saved tasks
help_center: &2chunky center <x> <z>&r - Set the center block location
help_continue: &2chunky continue&r - Continue current or saved tasks
help_pause: &2chunky pause&r - Pause current tasks and save progress
help_shape: &2chunky shape <shape>&r - Set the shape to generate
help_spawn: &2chunky spawn&r - Set the center to the spawn point
help_start: &2chunky start&r - Start a new chunk generation task
help_worldborder: &2chunky worldborder&r - Use the world border center & radius
task_done: Task finished for %s. Processed: %s chunks (%s%%), Total time: %s:%s:%s
task_update: Task running for %s. Processed: %s chunks (%s%%), ETA: %s:%s:%s, Rate: %s cps, Current: %s, %s
